overview:
Ray Nugent founded Smartscale Systems as the result of trying to get a scalable means of finding out what was happening in his company’s cloud.

Prior to Smartscale Ray was in Senior Management at Cisco systems leading Systems Management engineering teams to help drive growth from less than a billion to over Thirty Five billion dollars in revenue.

Prior to Cisco Ray lead the creation of the Internet Services Business line for Tandem subsidiary Ungermann-Bass.

Prior to UB Ray led the migration of proprietary telecommunications management protocols to SNMP at ROLM Systems, growing the product line to $45 million in revenue.

Ray Graduated from California State University at Chico with a degree in Electronics and Computer Technology
